name: test_two_scripts_spending_one_fail[plutus_v2]
description:
Test locking two Tx outputs with two different Plutus scripts in single Tx, one fails.

        Uses `cardano-cli transaction build` command for building the transactions.

        * create a Tx output with a datum hash at the script addresses
        * try to spend the locked UTxOs
        * check that the expected error was raised
descriptionHtml:
Test locking two Tx outputs with two different Plutus scripts in single Tx, one fails.

    Uses `cardano-cli transaction build` command for building the transactions.

    * create a Tx output with a datum hash at the script addresses
    * try to spend the locked UTxOs
    * check that the expected error was raised
statusMessage: Skipped: runs only with Babbage+ TX; needs PlutusV2 cost model
statusTrace: ('/home/martink/Source/repos/cardano-node-tests3/cardano_node_tests/tests/test_plutus_spend_build.py', 1617, 'Skipped: runs only with Babbage+ TX; needs PlutusV2 cost model')

labels.name: tag
labels.value: @pytest.mark.skipif(True, reason='runs only with Babbage+ TX; needs PlutusV2 cost model')

tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(True, reason='runs only with Babbage+ TX; needs PlutusV2 cost model')
